column4: hi guys i have this proble..... i have firstcommand  -o option1 -t option2 and secondcommand -t option1 -l option2 and i want that the option2 of the secondcommand is the output  of "firstcommand  -o option1 -t option2" ... how can i do that?????
I think you want this: secondcommand -t  option1 -l $(firstcommand  -o option1 -t option2)
yesssssssssssssssssss it works!!!! awesomw!!!! thank you very much
